title: Vojtech Preissig
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Vojtěch Preissig**

Czech type design and illustrator. Born in Bílina in 1873. Lived in the United States during World War I. Died in the Nazi concentration camp at Dachau in 1944.

Digitizations of Preissig type designs:

PREISSIG ANTIKVA  
P22 Preissig Roman - [P22 type foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/P22%20type%20foundry)  
Preissig Antikva - [František Štorm](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Franti%C5%A1ek%20%C5%A0torm)  
Ruzena Antikva - [Psy-Ops](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Psy-Ops)  
Preissig - [Alex White](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alex%20White)

OTHERS  
Czeska - [Typerware](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typerware)  
P22 Preissig Extras - [P22 type foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/P22%20type%20foundry)  
P22 Preissig Lino - [P22 type foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/P22%20type%20foundry)  
P22 Preissig Scrape - [P22 type foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/P22%20type%20foundry)  
Preissig 1918 - [František Štorm](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Franti%C5%A1ek%20%C5%A0torm)  
Preissig Ozdoby - [František Štorm](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Franti%C5%A1ek%20%C5%A0torm)

Recommended reading:  
**Vojtěch Preissig, Czech Typographer?** by Iva Knobloch, [Typo Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typo%20Magazine) issue 14, March 2005, [http://www.magtypo.cz](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203/http:/www.magtypo.cz/ "http://www.magtypo.cz")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120826035203im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typo-cover-14_4886.jpg)

author: filip blazek
